com.tomscz.afswinx.validation

Interface AFValidations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFBaseValidator, ContainsValidator, MinAndMaxLenghtValidator, MinAndMaxValueValidator, NumberValidator, RequiredValidator, RetypeValidator

    public interface AFValidations
    This interface specify behavior which must implement each validator which will be used to validation.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPriority()
      This method return validator priority.
      void setLocalization(java.util.ResourceBundle localization)
      This method set localization to actual validator.
      void validate(AFSwinx swinxInstance, AFSwinxPanel parentPanel, java.lang.Object value)
      Every validator must implement this method.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        void validate(AFSwinx swinxInstance,
            AFSwinxPanel parentPanel,
            java.lang.Object value)
              throws ValidationException
        Every validator must implement this method. If exception is thrown, that indicates, that validation was failed. You can use resource bundle. Just simply use LocalizationUtils to made localization on texts.
        Parameters:
        swinxInstance - global instance of AFSwinx
        parentPanel - this is parent which holds data fields and all necessary informations
        value - concrete value
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if validation is failed then this exception will be thrown

      • setLocalization

        void setLocalization(java.util.ResourceBundle localization)
        This method set localization to actual validator. It is used to customize error message.
        Parameters:
        localization - resource bundle with localization.

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        This method return validator priority.
        Returns:
        priority of validator.
